snippet.title: Grumpy Librarian - Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
Download the game or play in browser for free at: https://classheikki.itch.io/grumpy-librarian 



Welcome!

You are the new assistant librarian at the Library at the University of Esoteric and Occult Accademia. Your task is to in a “helpful” and “friendly” manner keep customers from taking out the books by referring to the (possibly cursed) Book of Library Rules.

This visual narrative / kafkaesque game is around 20 minutes long, features 7 quirky library patrons and will definitely ruin your afternoon. Don't make a cup of tea and don't cuddle up with your cat!

And please do not try to check out the Forbidden books.

Best,

Head Librarian 





Made by: Christina Lassheikki

Made using: Ren'Py

Made for Games Now! Online Jam 1, 23 - 29.3. 2020.

#gamejam #indiedev #gamejamgames #gamesnowjam #visualnovel
